etymology.description: 亻(亻) (rén, "person") + 左(左) (zuǒ) = person assisting -> to assist
etymology.interpretation: In the character 佐(佐) (zuǒ, "to assist"), the semantic component 亻(亻) (rén, "person") indicates the involvement of a person, while 左(左) (zuǒ) provides the phonetic hint. This combination suggests someone helping or aiding another, with the focus on action related to people.

examples.chinese: 我主动佐同事解决问题(我主動佐同事解決問題)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhǔdòng zuǒ tóngshì jiějué wèntí.
examples.english: I actively assist colleagues in solving problems.

examples.chinese: 他在危急关头佐医护人员抢救伤员(他在危急關頭佐醫護人員搶救傷員)，展现了团队合作精神(展現了團隊合作精神)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài wéijí guāntóu zuǒ yīhù rényuán qiǎngjiù shāngyuán, zhǎnxiàn le tuánduì hézuò jīngshén.
examples.english: He assisted the medical staff in rescuing the injured during a critical moment, demonstrating team spirit.
